attributes.action: take action once in a blue moon, based on the notion of a petition on this page
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To put it simply, petitions, protest and all other 'legal' forms of showing you're disagreement with a government stance are useless.
They just make people feel like they are doing something, when realistically, nobody is listening.
That puts the general public in a situation not unlike the 'Terrorists' we are apparently trying to fight. As more extreme and right invading laws are passed, we, the people have no way of being heard, and unless this is resolved, these, your people may have no choice but to start looking to more extreme ways of being heard.
This petition is to ask Gordon Brown, or whom ever may take power after him to change that, and start listening to the people.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
